SELECT COUNT(A.BBS_SEQ) AS CNT FROM TBL_BOARD A, TBl_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0

SELECT BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, BBS_GROUP, BBS_ORDER, BBS_INDENT, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_PARENT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, BBS_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, BBS_GROUP, BBS_ORDER, BBS_INDENT, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENT, BBS_READ_CNT, REG_DATE, BBS_PARENT FROM ( SELECT A.BBS_SEQ, A.USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NAME, '') AS USER_NAME, NVL(B.USER_EMAIL, '') AS USER_EMAIL, NVL(A.BBS_GROUP, 0) AS BBS_GROUP, NVL(A.BBS_ORDER, 0) AS BBS_ORDER, NVL(A.BBS_INDENT, 0) AS BBS_INDENT, NVL(A.BBS_TITLE, '') AS BBS_TITLE, NVL(A.BBS_CONTENT, '') AS BBS_CONTENT, NVL(A.BBS_READ_CNT, 0) AS BBS_READ_CNT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS'), '') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.BBS_PARENT, 0) AS BBS_PARENT FROM TBL_BOARD A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND B.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND A.BBS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DBMS_LOB.INSTR(A.BBS_CONTENT, #{searchValue}) > 0
ORDER BY A.BBS_GROUP DESC, A.BBS_ORDER ASC)) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
